title: Handle a Lost Child Report
description: A frantic parent reports to a theme park employee that they have become separated from their child.

tasks.description: Calm the parent and gather critical information: child's name, age, description, clothing, and last seen location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calmly and efficiently collects all necessary details.

tasks.description: Immediately initiate the park's 'lost child' protocol by broadcasting the information to all park security and staff.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully triggers the park-wide alert.

tasks.description: Escort the parent to a designated waiting area and provide continuous updates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides support to the parent while coordinating with security.
